title: Microchips PIC24F GB2 microcontroller
extract: The PIC24F “GB2” devices offer up to 128kbyte flash and 8kbyte RAM in small 28- or 44-pin packages, for battery-operated or portable applications. A Random Number Generator creates random keys for data encryption, decryption and authentication, to provide a higher level of security.Jun 25, 2014
